entry.title: JEOL Student Lecture Prize
entry.content:
I am honored to have been awarded the 21st annual JEOL Student Lecture Prize at the 50th annual international Royal Society of Chemistry EPR meeting. I would like to thank the organizers for the amazing opportunity to present my current work in Oxford at the beautiful Keble College. This prestegious award

The work I presented focuses on the use of micro-resonators, such as the Planar Micro Resonator (PMR) and micro-helix.
